Headline: Increased Wait Times on Red Line Service
ShortDescription: Red service is running with residual delays and busier trains/platform due to an earlier baseball game near Addison; crews working to restore normal service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red service is running with residual delays and busier trains/platform due to an earlier baseball game near Addison; crews working to restore normal service.

Crews are working to accommodate all passengers and restore normal service as quickly as is possible.

Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute at Milwaukee/Berteau
ShortDescription: #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Montrose, Cicero, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Berteau.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Montrose, Cicero then resume their normal route on Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Berteau.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark and #152 Addison Temporary Reroute near Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark and 152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark and #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

#22 Clark buses will operate via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark.

#152 Addison buses will operate via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison.

Allow extra travel time.
